description:
Job Title: Data Entry Specialist


Job Description:

Our client is seeking a meticulous and detail-oriented Data Entry professional to join the team. This role involves researching and compiling lead information from provided lists and accurately entering this data into various systems. The ideal candidate will be proficient in using Google Sheets, Excel, and CRM tools, and will be able to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.


About the Company:

Our client is an innovative platform dedicated to facilitating fundraising efforts and enhancing donor engagement. Their commitment to leveraging technology to streamline processes and improve outcomes makes them a leading player in the industry.


Work Schedule:

  • Full-Time availability, flexible schedule.


Responsibilities:

  • Research and identify sources of leads from lists provided by the client.
  • Accurately enter data into Google Sheets, Excel, and CRM systems.
  • Maintain data integrity and ensure accuracy in data entry.
  • Collaborate with the team to ensure data is processed in a timely manner.


Required Experience and Qualifications:

  • Proficiency in Google Sheets and Excel for managing and organizing lists.
  • Experience with CRM systems.
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy in data entry.
